goals__remit:
Pro-Active is a “knowledge based” company providing services in the fields of: 
•    Scientific and technological advice – Key Enabling Technologies.  
•    Innovation management, value chains and forward studies. 
•    Industrial strategy, pilot line management and upscaling. 
•    Business plans and financing. 
•    Project design, implementation and management. 
•    Evaluation and monitoring (ex-ante, ongoing, ex-post). 
•    Strategy design, road mapping, policy recommendations. 
•    International Cooperation, LAC. 
•    Socio-economic analysis, sustainability appraisal and Governance. 
•    Education and learning assessment. 
•    Communication strategy and implementation.  
•    ICT, IoT, Big data analysis and cloud technology.
